title: Replay rule, Cardinals, LeBron James, and Russell Westbrook
itunes:title: Replay rule, Cardinals, LeBron James, and Russell Westbrook
description:
Colin continues to explain why being able to review pass interference will hurt the NFL, why the Arizona Cardinals might be flirting with former Oklahoma Sooners QB Kyler Murray, what Kobe Bryant and Michael Jordan do better than Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James, and what happens when Oklahoma City Thunder G Russell Westbrook shoots less. Guests include Albert Breer, Kenyon Martin, Michael Rapaport, T. J. Houshmandzadeh, and Jason McIntyre. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
